ovdesc.p: Stores the publicly known Standing Settlement Instructions for correspondent banks. They are also known as currency correspondents.
This is defined for a look-up on BIC’s and not on NCC’s. If the look-up is on a NCC then it is first converted into a BIC and then searched for in this table

desc.p: Used for internal purposes.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table PPL.STANDINGSETTMNTINSTRUC. This field can hold upto 15 alphanumeric characters.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.

the upload process. If set to ‘Y’ then the data can be overridden by the upload
